dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of Claimed Infringement -- VUG030905-2]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 10, 2005 3:56 AM
To: jsnyder@theesa.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Claimed Infringement -- VUG030905-2]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Notice of Claimed Infringement -- VUG030905-2
Date:         Wed, 9 Mar 2005 09:54:47 -0500
From:         Jake Snyder <jsnyder@theesa.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>, <admins@theplanet.com>



Entertainment Software Association

1211 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.

Washington, DC 20036 USA



Attention:  Piracy Enforcement ? DMCA Officer

Telephone:  202-223-2400

Fax:  202-223-2401


  E-mail:  dmca@theesa.com <mailto:dmca@theesa.com>


  * *


  Date: March 9, 2005



Dear ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.,



I am an authorized representative of the Entertainment Software Association
(?ESA?), which represents the intellectual property interests of twenty-five
(25) companies that publish interactive games for video game consoles,
personal computers, handheld devices and the Internet.



ESA is providing this letter of notification pursuant to the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act and 17 USC
